languages.text: "Я, со своей стороны, умоляю Лорд-капитана спуститься на нижние палубы, остановить спецотряд и лично поговорить с людьми. Вы увидите, что они не лгут и не покрывают еретиков! И сможете остановить бунт, прежде чем он начнется".

"For my part, I urge the Lord Captain to go down to the lower decks, stop the assault unit, and speak directly to the people. You will see that they are not lying, or harbouring heretics! That way, you will stop the uprising before it begins."
languages.original_text: "Я, со своей стороны, умоляю Лорд-капитана спуститься на нижние палубы, остановить спецотряд и лично поговорить с людьми. Вы увидите, что они не лгут и не покрывают еретиков! И сможете остановить бунт, прежде чем он начнется".

traits.locale_text: "For my part, I urge the Lord Captain to go down to the lower decks, stop the assault unit, and speak directly to the people. You will see that they are not lying, or harboring pirates! That way, you will stop the uprising before it begins."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

traits.locale_text: "For my part, I urge the Lord Captain to go down to the lower decks, stop the assault unit, and speak directly to the people. You will see that they are not lying, or harboring pirates! That way, you will stop the uprising before it begins."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

traits.locale_text: "For my part, I urge the Lord Captain to go down to the lower decks, stop the assault unit, and speak directly to the people. You will see that they are not lying, or harboring pirates! That way, you will stop the uprising before it begins."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

traits.locale_text: "For my part, I urge the Lord Captain to go down to the lower decks, stop the assault unit, and speak directly to the people. You will see that they are not lying, or harbouring heretics! That way, you will stop the uprising before it begins."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: “就我而言，我希望舰长大人能前往底层甲板，阻止那些突击队员，直接和那些工人谈谈。这样您便会意识到他们并没有撒谎，也并没有窝藏异端分子！这样一来，您便可以赶在起义爆发之前将其阻止。”
languages.original_text: "For my part, I urge the Lord Captain to go down to the lower decks, stop the assault unit, and speak directly to the people. You will see that they are not lying, or harbouring heretics! That way, you will stop the uprising before it begins."

traits.locale_text: “就我而言，我希望舰长大人能前往底层甲板，阻止那些突击队员，直接和那些工人谈谈。这样您便会意识到他们并没有撒谎，也并没有窝藏海盗！这样一来，您便可以赶在起义爆发之前将其阻止。”
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: «Por mi parte, ruego a{mf|l| la} que acuda a las cubiertas inferiores, detenga a la unidad de asalto y hable directamente con la gente. ¡Verá que ni mienten ni esconden a herejes! Puede detener la rebelión antes de que se produzca».
languages.original_text: "For my part, I urge the Lord Captain to go down to the lower decks, stop the assault unit, and speak directly to the people. You will see that they are not lying, or harbouring heretics! That way, you will stop the uprising before it begins."

traits.locale_text: «Por mi parte, ruego a{mf|l| la} que acuda a las cubiertas inferiores, detenga a la unidad de asalto y hable directamente con la gente. ¡Verá que ni mienten ni esconden a piratas! Puede detener la rebelión antes de que se produzca».
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: 「私としては、ロード・キャプテンには下層デッキに降りて、突撃部隊を止め、人々と直接話すよう強く求めます。彼らが嘘をついたり、異端者をかくまったりしていないことを確認するのです！そうすれば、蜂起が始まる前に止めることができるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "For my part, I urge the Lord Captain to go down to the lower decks, stop the assault unit, and speak directly to the people. You will see that they are not lying, or harbouring heretics! That way, you will stop the uprising before it begins."

traits.locale_text: 「私としては、ロード・キャプテンには下層デッキに降りて、突撃部隊を止め、人々と直接話すよう強く求めます。彼らが嘘をついたり、異端者をかくまったりしていないことを確認するのです！そうすれば、蜂起が始まる前に止めることができるでしょう」
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: "Ich für meinen Teil bitte den Lord Captain inständig, auf die Unterdecks zu gehen, die Sturmeinheit zurückzupfeifen und persönlich mit den Leuten zu sprechen. Ihr werdet sehen, dass sie weder lügen noch Ketzer verstecken! So könnt Ihr den Aufstand im Keim ersticken."
languages.original_text: "For my part, I urge the Lord Captain to go down to the lower decks, stop the assault unit, and speak directly to the people. You will see that they are not lying, or harbouring heretics! That way, you will stop the uprising before it begins."

traits.locale_text: "Ich für meinen Teil bitte den Lord Captain inständig, auf die Unterdecks zu gehen, die Sturmeinheit zurückzupfeifen und persönlich mit den Leuten zu sprechen. Ihr werdet sehen, dass sie weder lügen noch Piraten verstecken! So könnt Ihr den Aufstand im Keim ersticken."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: « Pour ma part, je vous suggère de vous rendre personnellement sur les ponts inférieurs, d'arrêter l'escadron d'assaut et de vous adresser directement aux ouvriers, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Vous verrez que ces pauvres gens ne mentent pas, pas plus qu'ils ne cachent d'hérétiques dans leurs rangs ! C'est le seul moyen de calmer le jeu avant que la révolte éclate pour de bon. »
languages.original_text: "For my part, I urge the Lord Captain to go down to the lower decks, stop the assault unit, and speak directly to the people. You will see that they are not lying, or harbouring heretics! That way, you will stop the uprising before it begins."

traits.locale_text: « Pour ma part, je vous suggère de vous rendre personnellement sur les ponts inférieurs, d'arrêter l'escadron d'assaut et de vous adresser directement aux ouvriers, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Vous verrez que ces pauvres gens ne mentent pas, pas plus qu'ils ne cachent des pirates dans leurs rangs ! C'est le seul moyen de calmer le jeu avant que la révolte éclate pour de bon. »
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: "Ben ise Lord Kaptan'ın alt güverteye inmesini, taarruz birimini durdurmasını ve insanlarla doğrudan konuşmasını istirham ederim. Yalan söylemediklerini, kâfirlere kucak açmadıklarını göreceksiniz! Böylece isyanı da başlamadan bitirmiş olacaksınız."
languages.original_text: "For my part, I urge the Lord Captain to go down to the lower decks, stop the assault unit, and speak directly to the people. You will see that they are not lying, or harbouring heretics! That way, you will stop the uprising before it begins."

traits.locale_text: "Ben ise Lord Kaptan'ın alt güverteye inmesini, taarruz birimini durdurmasını ve insanlarla doğrudan konuşmasını istirham ederim. Yalan söylemediklerini, kâfirlere kucak açmadıklarını göreceksiniz! Böylece isyanı da başlamadan bitirmiş olacaksınız."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader
